author: Simon Difford
description: Use an authentic tasting distilled old tom gin that's balanced rather than overly sweet, and you'll have a fabulous cocktail.I've used dry vermouth to balance the sweet vermouth. However, if you're looking for simplicity and fewer ingredients then you may prefer to omit the dry vermouth, balancing  by instead reducing the sweet vermouth and maraschino while also doubling the bitters as follows:2 shot Old Tom Gin2/3 shot Sweet vermouth1/8 shot Maraschino2 dashes of Aromatic bitters
name: Martinez (with Old Tom gin)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
